name: organization_identifier
description: The details of the third party identifiers for organizations, such as: company registration number, charity number, tax registration number.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for this organization identifier entry. Each entry must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.title: Organization Identifier
organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization. This should match the uuid of an organization object.

identifier_scheme.name: identifier_scheme
identifier_scheme.title: Identifier Scheme
identifier_scheme.description: The scheme of the third party identifier, according to http://org-id.guide/.

identifier_type.name: identifier_type
identifier_type.title: Identifier Type
identifier_type.description: A human-readable equivalent of the identifier_scheme. This may be used in cases where org-id.guide does not list an appropriate identifier scheme.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: A link between a service and one or more classifications that describe the nature of the service provided.
